column1: Mahanoro is a city and rural commune located in the Atsinanana region of eastern Madagascar
It is located 9 km north of the mouth of the Mangoro River.  The Canal des Pangalanes is nearby
column2: and the "Chutes de la Sahatsio" waterfalls are 18 km north of town.  Though a small airport is situated on the north side of the town
column3: the location is quite isolated and with limited tourism
column4: though it is reported to have a single hotel.The town's name means "who makes happy."There is a lighthouse on a cape just south of the town
